bitnot

Operation

Bitwise not.

Format

bitnot

Forms

bitnot = 151 (0x97)

Stack

..., value => ..., ~value

Description

Pop value off of the stack. Convert value to an integer, as per ECMA-262 section 11.4.8, and then apply the bitwise complement operator (~) to the integer. Push the result onto the stack.

Runtime exceptions

None.

Notes

None.
